runtimes:tests.description: Retrieve tests execution time for a given deployment

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

deployment.name: deployment
deployment.description: id of the deployment to get tests execution time for

output.name: output
output.description: where do you want to output the results

target.name: target
target.description: target location to save the results (include filename for csv and json)

threshold.name: threshold
threshold.description: return the tests execution time to only those above the threshold (in milliseconds)
